attributes.background: I think that since 16 year olds can vote, I think that they can start learning to how to drive because they are given a huge responsibility of voting for our country, if 16 year old is the age of consent, why can’t they learn how to drive at the same age?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reduce age limit for holding a full driving licence to 16 with restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733742
